name: Tweak Shot
description:
Tweak Shot is a minimalistic physics puzzle game in which you have to tweak the positioning of platforms in order to make the ball bounce to the goal.

Controls

  • Use left mouse button to place platforms
  • When you're ready press Play Button
  • If your plan fails press Retry Button and tweak the positioning of platforms
  • All platforms must be destroyed before level can end
  • Press space to skip level

Credits

  • Made by Alienplay Games - http://alienplaygames.com
  • Sound Effects by Dustyroom - http://dustyroom.com
  • Music by The Cynic Project - https://cynicmusic.com
